DOC.brief_title: A Study Demonstrate Bioequivalence Between 6 x 2 mg Tablets Perampanel Single 12 mg Tablet Perampanel Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Single Centre , open label , 2-period , 2-sequence crossover bioequivalence study one group 28 subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 1855 year . BMI 1832 kg/m ^2 . Willing able provide write informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Subjects take prescribed counter ( OTC ) medication 2 week prior screen . Subjects special diet dietary aid know modulate drug metabolize enzyme . Subjects take inhibitor CYP450 within 2 week first dose . Subjects receive experimental drug 12 week prior study drug treatment . Subjects history alcohol abuse drink recommend number alcohol unit per week . Subjects consume five caffeinated beverage per day . Subjects smoke 5 cigarette per day . Subjects history drug abuse positive urine drug screen test . Women agree use two method contraception .
